div.head: 便溺遺失
div.div: uncontrolled [major] relief and loss of urine; incontinence

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: uncontrolled [major] relief and loss of urine; incontinence

sense.def: Illness Sign of uncontrollable discharge of stool and/or urine. SWBJQYBMJ Fj: 開腸洞 泄， 便溺遺失，必澀劑以收之 , “It opens the intestines and causes outflow, resulting in stool and urine incontinence . This requires the intake of astringent remedies to hold [the outflow]”.
